sentences.english: That is, to bear the fruit the vine wishes to bring forth.
sentences.chinese: 这个目标就是要结出葡萄树想要结的果子来。

sentences.english: Firstly, Ezekiel had a vision of God and His sovereignty.
sentences.chinese: 首先，以西结得到神的异象，并认识神的主权。

sentences.english: Four xi think appropriate solutions of unfavorable knot, elected to day zhen also left behind.
sentences.chinese: 四喜认为冤家宜解不宜结，便将天贞也留了下来。

sentences.english: Chi Zijian's novel has strong hometown feelings.
sentences.chinese: 迟子建小说有着浓浓的乡恋情结。

sentences.english: More than a few of us do not know the difference between black-tie or white-tie events.
sentences.chinese: 但很多人却不知着黑领结或白领结盛会的不同之处。

sentences.english: Simply keep practicing the Windsor Knot a few more times until you can tie this necktie knot within less than two minutes.
sentences.chinese: 你可以多练练温莎结的打法，争取两分钟就能搞定它。

sentences.english: The pine and fir are coniferous trees.
sentences.chinese: 松树和枞树都是结球果的植物。

sentences.english: A comparison of laparoscopically assisted and open colectomy for colon cancer.
sentences.chinese: 腹腔镜手术治疗结直肠癌安全性的临床研究。

sentences.english: The knot which you thought a Gordian one will untie it before you.
sentences.chinese: 你认为很难解开的那个结，有人比你更早解开呢。

sentences.english: Only the resultant matrix is needed to solve the greatest common factor of polynomials …
sentences.chinese: 该方法仅利用结矩阵便可求得多项式的最大公因式。

sentences.english: The matured larvae pupate on the back of leaves.
sentences.chinese: 幼虫在叶背吐丝结稀疏的薄茧化蛹。

sentences.english: Bring the wide end down through the knot in front.
sentences.chinese: 让宽的那端穿过前面打好的结。

sentences.english: With reduced savings, the public has less capital to invest in engineering projects.
sentences.chinese: 结余额减少了，公众投资工程项目的资金也就减少了。

sentences.english: I saw her father with his rosette on, canvassing for the Conservatives.
sentences.chinese: 我看见她父亲戴着玫瑰花结，正在为保守党游说拉票。

sentences.english: As in my mind she has never entangled knot untied.
sentences.chinese: 任她在我的心中纠结起永不解开的结。

sentences.english: God told Ezekiel it was where his people that he loved were at.
sentences.chinese: 上帝告诉以西结，那是他喜悦的子民所居地。
